column4: Each additional player places 15 different source tokens in, and an additional 8 are drawn. Up to 4 players at a time, can do 2v2

column3: Spend tokens to cast spells, abilities, place cards
Round is over when all source tokens are spent, or players agree that nothing further can be done
Place spent tokens back into bag, shuffle and redraw them each round
Goal or game is to destroy enemy army leader
Source tokens are not affinity specific, can have decks with any affinity combinations... but cards sync well with same affinity
Each deck can be built with up to 1000 points worth of cards and a single army leader
